p: The nose and throat swab and lower respiratory tract samples listed here are in addition to samples taken at enrolment (day 1) and are collected at five further time points: days 2–3, days 4–5, days 6–7, days 8–10 and days 11–14+. An additional blood sample (maximum of 10 mL) may be taken at days 5–7. The participant may decline all or any of these additional tests.
